issue.title: [CI] macOS R autobrew nightly failed on installing dependency from source
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7817](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7817). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Failing build: https://travis-ci.org/ursa-labs/crossbow/builds/648308138
Probably an OSX SDK issue.

cc `[~npr]`

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7817?focusedCommentId=17033981) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
